tool.name: NormalizeFasta
tool.command:
@java_options@
## Two lines below are due to the fact that picard likes fasta files to have extension .fa #set $fasta_file="local_fasta.fa" ln -s "${inputFile}" "${fasta_file}" &&
java -jar \$JAVA_JAR_PATH/picard.jar NormalizeFasta
INPUT="${fasta_file}" OUTPUT="${outFile}" LINE_LENGTH="${line_length}" TRUNCATE_SEQUENCE_NAMES_AT_WHITESPACE="${truncate_sequence_names_at_whitespaces}"
QUIET=true VERBOSITY=ERROR

param.name: inputFile
param.label: FASTA dataset or dataset collection
param.help: If empty, upload or import a FASTA dataset

param.name: line_length
param.label: The line length to be used for the output fasta file

param.name: truncate_sequence_names_at_whitespaces
param.label: Truncate sequence names at first whitespace
